thread.title: It feels like a better home
thread.title_full: It feels like a better home - Review of The Peninsula Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mimoq8
title: It feels like a better home
text:
I have a very special memories with this hotel I've stayed there for more than 14 nights in 2015 I know every corner every laughter I had there. I celebrated my 30th birthday there they made it like no one les can do thank you so much peninsula team for making this thing happened.
Mohammed Al Azemi
